scenarios.name: Scenario 1: Default matches count
scenarios.purpose: Validate that a default location with no variance keeps the counted value.
scenarios.expected_output: RecommendationType should be ADJUST (or no action) with SetLocationQtyTo equal to Counted Qty.

scenarios.name: Scenario 2: Default above max, ST01 buffer
scenarios.purpose: Confirm that default location snaps down when counted quantity is above the allowed max.
scenarios.expected_output: SetLocationQtyTo should align to default system + ST01 buffer.

scenarios.name: Scenario 3: Default below min, secondary variance
scenarios.purpose: Check that a low default count is raised to minimum and that secondary variance triggers adjust.
scenarios.expected_output: Default should adjust up to system qty; secondary should adjust to counted qty.
